Description: Bawan Co (known as: Bawan) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 2013. Bawan operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Building Products. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Bawan is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 1980.

Shareholder Name: Abdulkader Al Muhaidib and Sons Co
